member.name: D3D11_CLEAR_FLAG
member.summary: Specifies the parts of the depth stencil to clear.

member.name: D3D11_CLEAR_FLAG.D3D11_CLEAR_DEPTH
member.summary: Clear the depth buffer, using fast clear if possible, then place the resource in a compressed state.

member.name: D3D11_CLEAR_FLAG.D3D11_CLEAR_STENCIL
member.summary: Clear the stencil buffer, using fast clear if possible, then place the resource in a compressed state.
